TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public Class DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection Inherits BaseCollection Implements IList
public ref class DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection : System::Windows::Forms::BaseCollection, System::Collections::IList
type DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection = class inherit BaseCollection interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents a collection of objects that are selected in a .

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that are selected in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks No se garantiza el orden de columnas de la colección para que coincida con el orden en el que se han seleccionado.The order of columns in the collection is not guaranteed to match the order in which they were selected. El no proporcionan de forma eficiente cuando se trabaja con un gran número de columnas.The does not perform efficiently when working with large numbers of columns. Por lo general, controles no contiene suficientes columnas para que sea un problema, pero si está trabajando con un gran número de columnas, puede utilizar el para determinar si se selecciona toda la cuadrícula, o puede usar el para determinar el número de columnas seleccionadas (o el número de columnas en un determinado estado).Typically, controls will not contain enough columns for this to be an issue, but if you are working with large numbers of columns, you can use the to determine if the entire grid is selected, or you can use the to determine the number of selected columns (or the number of columns in a specified state). Para obtener más información, consulte [procedimientos recomendados para ajustar la escala del DataGridView Control de formularios Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
